# utm.airat.top

Summary:
UTM.airat.top is a static, privacy-first UTM generator for building campaign URLs. Everything runs locally in the browser.

Primary URL:
https://utm.airat.top

Key features:
- Builds full URLs with utm_source, utm_medium, utm_campaign, utm_term, and utm_content.
- Optional preservation of existing query parameters.
- Presets for popular platforms (Yandex, Google, VK, YouTube, Telegram, Social, Partner, Email, Banner).
- One-click copy for full URLs or only UTM tags.
- Local settings stored in the browser.

Tech stack:
HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.

Privacy:
No history or analytics; only local settings are stored. All generation happens locally.

Contact:
AiratTop â€” mail@airat.top
